Calculating average phastCons score for each window:

```{bash}
~/Software/utils/bigWigAverageOverBed ~/Mouse_Cereb/006_peaks/001_peak_annotation/phastCons/mm10.60way.phastCons60wayPlacental.bw ~/Mouse_Cereb/006_peaks/001_peak_annotation/phastCons/Mouse_Cerebellum_peaks_final_100bp_windows_10bp_step.bed ~/Mouse_Cereb/006_peaks/001_peak_annotation/phastCons/Mouse_Cerebellum_peaks_100bp_windows_phastCons_placental.txt -minMax
```

Reading in the results:

```{r}
phastcons_windows <- read_tsv("~/Mouse_Cereb/006_peaks/001_peak_annotation/phastCons/Mouse_Cerebellum_peaks_100bp_windows_phastCons_placental.txt", col_names = F)

## The column of interest is X6 (mean0, i.e.counting non-covered bases as 0)
phastcons_windows_sum <- mutate(phastcons_windows, peak=gsub("_[0-9]*$", "", X1)) %>%
  group_by(peak) %>%
  summarise(meanPhastCons_Placental_100bp=max(X6), mostCons100bp_window=X1[which.max(X6)])

## Getting the info about the most conserved region:
phastcons_windows_sum <- left_join(phastcons_windows_sum, dplyr::rename(peak_sliding_windows,mostCons100bp_window=window_name))

phastcons_windows_sum$mostCons100bp_Placental <- paste(phastcons_windows_sum$chr, phastcons_windows_sum$start, phastcons_windows_sum$end, sep = "_")

peaks <- left_join(peaks, select(phastcons_windows_sum, peak, meanPhastCons_Placental_100bp, mostCons100bp_Placental))
```

```{r}
cor(peaks$meanPhastCons_100bp, peaks$meanPhastCons_Placental_100bp)
cor(peaks$meanPhastCons_100bp, peaks$meanPhastCons_Glires_100bp)
```

Now we can calculate per cell stats (using robust distal CREs) - both all and for different age groups.

```{r}
peak_mat <- readRDS("~/Mouse_Cereb/006_peaks/Mouse_Cerebellum_reproducible_peak_matrix_SE_withInfo_robustPeaks.rds")
```

```{r}
clust <- sort(unique(peak_mat@colData$Clusters_finalNucSet_res1.5))

cell.stats <- Reduce(bind_rows, lapply(clust, function(id) {
  print(paste0("Preparing matrix for: ", id))
  cell_i <- which(peak_mat@colData$Clusters_finalNucSet_res1.5==id)
  atac.data <- assay(peak_mat[,cell_i])
  row.names(atac.data) <- peak_mat@elementMetadata$peak
  summ <- Matrix::summary(atac.data)
  atac.data.tidy <- data.frame(peak = rownames(atac.data)[summ$i],
           cell = colnames(atac.data)[summ$j],
           count = summ$x, stringsAsFactors = F)
  atac.data.tidy <- left_join(atac.data.tidy, select(peaks, peak, genomic_class, genomic_class_broad,  meanPhastCons_Placental_100bp, min_age_num))
  print(paste0("Generating stats for: ", id))
  cell.stats <- group_by(atac.data.tidy, cell) %>%
  summarise(mean_phastcons_Placental_dist = mean(meanPhastCons_Placental_100bp[genomic_class_broad %in% c("Distal", "Intronic")]),
             mean_phastcons_Placental_dist_20 = mean(meanPhastCons_Placental_100bp[genomic_class_broad %in% c("Distal", "Intronic") & min_age_num==20]),
  mean_phastcons_Placental_dist_90 = mean(meanPhastCons_Placental_100bp[genomic_class_broad %in% c("Distal", "Intronic") & min_age_num==90]),
  mean_phastcons_Placental_dist_105 = mean(meanPhastCons_Placental_100bp[genomic_class_broad %in% c("Distal", "Intronic") & min_age_num==105]),
    mean_phastcons_Placental_dist_160 = mean(meanPhastCons_Placental_100bp[genomic_class_broad %in% c("Distal", "Intronic") & min_age_num==160]),
  mean_phastcons_Placental_dist_177 = mean(meanPhastCons_Placental_100bp[genomic_class_broad %in% c("Distal", "Intronic") & min_age_num==177]),
  mean_phastcons_Placental_dist_312 = mean(meanPhastCons_Placental_100bp[genomic_class_broad %in% c("Distal", "Intronic") & min_age_num==312]),
  mean_phastcons_Placental_dist_435 = mean(meanPhastCons_Placental_100bp[genomic_class_broad %in% c("Distal", "Intronic") & min_age_num==435]),
            total=n(),
            count_sum=sum(count))
  return(cell.stats)
}))
```


```{r}
saveRDS(cell.stats, "~/Mouse_Cereb/016_conservation_and_repeats/Mouse_phastcons_Placentals_cell_stats_byAge.rds")
```

```{r}
cell_lineage_stats <- filter(cell.stats, !Cell_type_broad %in% c("Parabrachial+Isthmic_nuclei", "Glut_DN+Isthmic_nuclei", "Other")) %>%

  summarise(
    ## Phastons in distal CREs (Placental) - age 20
    phastcons_Placental_dist_all_ci_low=Rmisc::CI(mean_phastcons_Placental_dist, ci = 0.95)[3],
    phastcons_Placental_dist_all_ci_mean=Rmisc::CI(mean_phastcons_Placental_dist, ci = 0.95)[2],

    phastcons_Placental_dist_105_ci_low=Rmisc::CI(mean_phastcons_Placental_dist_105, ci = 0.95)[3],

    phastcons_Placental_dist_177_ci_up=Rmisc::CI(mean_phastcons_Placental_dist_177, ci = 0.95)[1],
    ## Phastons in distal CREs (Placental) - age 312
    phastcons_Placental_dist_312_ci_low=Rmisc::CI(mean_phastcons_Placental_dist_312, ci = 0.95)[3],
    phastcons_Placental_dist_312_ci_mean=Rmisc::CI(mean_phastcons_Placental_dist_312, ci = 0.95)[2],
    phastcons_Placental_dist_312_ci_up=Rmisc::CI(mean_phastcons_Placental_dist_312, ci = 0.95)[1],

    phastcons_Placental_dist_435_ci_low=Rmisc::CI(mean_phastcons_Placental_dist_435, ci = 0.95)[3],
```

```{r}
p <- ggplot(filter(cell_lineage_stats_major, count >=50), aes(x=t, y= phastcons_Placental_dist_all_ci_mean, color=Cell_type_broad)) +

  scale_x_continuous(breaks = seq(min(cell_lineage_stats_major$t), max(cell_lineage_stats_major$t), by = 1), labels=sort(unique(cell_lineage_stats_major$Timepoint))) +
  scale_color_manual(values = levels(cell_lineage_stats_major$Cell_type_broad_color)) +
  #scale_y_continuous(breaks = seq(0.4, 0.6, by = 0.02)) +
  theme_classic() +
  ylab("Phastcons placentals (distal CREs)") +
    xlab("Developmental stage") +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1), panel.grid.minor.x = element_blank(), panel.grid.major.x = element_blank())

p

group_by(cell_lineage_stats_major, Cell_type_broad) %>%
  summarise(r=cor.test(phastcons_Placental_dist_all_ci_mean, t, method = "pearson")$estimate,
```

Finally, phastCons across pseudotime for matched differentiation states.

```{r}
#1. Which lineage is to be processed?
lineage <- "GC"

pseudotime_bins <- read_tsv(paste0("~/Mouse_Cereb/015_withinLineages/", lineage, "/Mouse_within", lineage, "_pseudotime_stats.txt"))

pseudotime_bins$pseudotime_bin_broad <- cut(x = pseudotime_bins$pseudotime, breaks = seq(0,1, by = 0.05),include.lowest = T, labels = F)
```

```{r}
cell_stats <- left_join(cell.stats, pseudotime_bins)
```

```{r}
cell_stats$sample <- paste(cell_stats$pseudotime_bin_broad, cell_stats$timepoint, sep = "_")

cell_stats_sum <- filter(cell_stats, is.na(pseudotime)==F) %>%
  group_by(sample, timepoint, pseudotime_bin_broad) %>%
  summarise(
    ## Phastons in distal CREs (placentals)
    phastcons_Placental_dist_ci_low=Rmisc::CI(mean_phastcons_Placental_dist, ci = 0.95)[3],
    phastcons_Placental_dist_ci_mean=Rmisc::CI(mean_phastcons_Placental_dist, ci = 0.95)[2],
    phastcons_Placental_dist_ci_up=Rmisc::CI(mean_phastcons_Placental_dist, ci = 0.95)[1],
    ## Pseudotime values within bin (control)
    pseudotime_ci_low=Rmisc::CI(pseudotime, ci = 0.95)[3],
    pseudotime_ci_mean=Rmisc::CI(pseudotime, ci = 0.95)[2],
    pseudotime_ci_up=Rmisc::CI(pseudotime, ci = 0.95)[1],
    ## Number of cells in each bin
    count=n())

p <- ggplot(filter(cell_stats_sum, count > 20), aes(x=pseudotime_bin_broad, y=phastcons_Placental_dist_ci_mean, color=timepoint)) +
  geom_pointrange(aes(ymin=phastcons_Placental_dist_ci_low, ymax=phastcons_Placental_dist_ci_up)) +
  geom_line() +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = 1:20) +
  scale_color_brewer(palette = "Spectral", name="Dev. stage")+
  theme_classic() +
  xlab("Pseudotime bin (GC)") +
  ylab("Phastcons placentals (distal elements)")

p

pdf(paste0("~/Mouse_Cereb/Figures/007_withinLineages/", lineage, "/Mouse_within", lineage, "_cellStats_phastCons_placentals_distal.pdf"), width=6, height = 4, useDingbats = F); print(p); dev.off()
```

```{r}
m_full_Placental <- lm(mean_phastcons_Placental_dist ~ pseudotime + as.numeric(factor(timepoint)), data = cell_stats[is.na(cell_stats$pseudotime)==F,])

m_pseudo_only_Placental <- lm(mean_phastcons_Placental_dist ~ pseudotime, data = cell_stats[is.na(cell_stats$pseudotime)==F,])

m_dev_only_Placental <- lm(mean_phastcons_Placental_dist ~ as.numeric(factor(timepoint)), data = cell_stats[is.na(cell_stats$pseudotime)==F,])

anova(m_full_Placental, m_pseudo_only_Placental)
anova(m_full_Placental, m_dev_only_Placental)

coefficients(summary(m_full_Placental))
```
